85:7: wa-hum  a-laa  maa  yaf  a-loo-na  bil-mu-mi-nee-na  shu-hood
85:8: wa-maa  na-qa-moo  mi-nhum  il-laaa  ai  yu-mi-noo  bil-laa-hil  azee-zil   hameed
85:9: al-lazee  la-hoo  mul-kus  sa-maa-waa-ti  wa-lard   wal-laa-hu  a-laa  kul-li  shaiin   shaheed
85:10: in-nal  lazee-na   fa-ta-nul  mu-mi-nee-na  wal-mu-mi-naa-ti  sum-ma  lam  ya-too-boo  fa-la-hum  a-zaa-bu  ja-han-na-ma  wa-la-hum  a-zaa-bul  hareeq
85:11: in-nal  lazee-na   aa-ma-noo  waa-mi-lus  saa-li-haa-ti  la-hum  jan-naa-tun  taj-ree  min  tah-ti-hal  a-nhaar    zaa-li-kal  faw-zul   kabeer
